verses.text:
How soft the name of Jesus sounds In true believer's ear;
Sweet est earth-ly name my heart has held, And dearest far and near.

To my heart it brings a blessing, And my lips take up the strain;
Oh, my soul can find no music, Like the precious name of Jesus.

chorus.text:
To the world be-hold, I sing that ho-ly name!
Tell its sweetness over a-gain,
To the same all-glorious name!
Blessed name! blessed name!
Blessed name!
